abstract: A U.S. federal judge ruled that Morgan Stanley and two credit rating agencies must defend fraud charges in a class-action lawsuit accusing them of masking the risks of an investment linked to subprime mortgages, and which eventually collapsed.
snippet: A U.S. federal judge ruled that Morgan Stanley and two credit rating agencies must defend fraud charges in a class-action lawsuit accusing them of masking the risks of an investment linked to subprime mortgages, and which eventually collapsed.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled that Morgan Stanley and two credit rating agencies must defend fraud charges in a class-action lawsuit accusing them of masking the risks of an investment linked to subprime mortgages, which eventually collapsed.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley, Moody’s, S.&P. to Defend in Fraud Suit

abstract: Investors find little in a series of economic reports to push the market higher after a four-day slide.
snippet: Investors find little in a series of economic reports to push the market higher after a four-day slide.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose, snapping a four-day losing streak for the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index, as some retail stores reported sales that topped projections and Chinese equities rallied the most in six months.

headline.main: Financials Rise, Helping to End 4 Losing Days for S.&P. 500
headline.print_headline: Financials Rise, Helping to End 4 Losing Days for S.&P. 500
